verses.verse: Now when Mordecai<WH4782> found<WH3045> out all that was done,<WH6213> Mordecai<WH4782> tore<WH7167> his clothes,<WH899> and put on<WH3847> sackcloth<WH8242> with ashes,<WH665> and went out<WH3318> into the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> and wailed<WH2199> loudly<WH1419> and bitterly.<WH4751>
He came<WH935> even before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>'s gate,<WH8179> for no one is allowed inside<WH935> the king<WH4428>'s gate<WH8179> clothed<WH3830> with sackcloth.<WH8242>

In every province,<WH4082> wherever<WH4725> the king<WH4428>'s commandment<WH1697> and his decree<WH1697> came,<WH5060> there was great<WH1419> mourning<WH60> among the Jews,<WH3064> and fasting,<WH6685> and weeping,<WH1065> and wailing;<WH4553> and many<WH7227> lay<WH3331> in sackcloth<WH8242> and ashes.<WH665>

Esther<WH635>'s maidens<WH5291> and her eunuchs<WH5631> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> her this,<WH4436> and the queen was exceedingly<WH3966> grieved.<WH2342> She sent<WH7971> clothing<WH899> to Mordecai,<WH4782> to<WH5493> replace<WH3847> his sackcloth;<WH8242> but he didn't<WH6901> receive it.

Then Esther<WH635> called<WH7121> for Hathach,<WH2047> one of the king<WH4428>'s eunuchs,<WH5631> whom he had appointed<WH5975> to attend<WH6440> her,<WH6680> and commanded him to go to Mordecai,<WH4782> to find out what this was,<WH3045> and why it was.
So Hathach<WH2047> went out<WH3318> to Mordecai,<WH4782> to city<WH5892> square<WH7339> which was before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>'s gate.<WH8179>

Mordecai<WH4782> told<WH5046> him of all that had happened<WH7136> to him,<WH6575> and the exact sum of the money<WH3701> that Haman<WH2001> had promised<WH559> to pay<WH8254> to the king<WH4428>'s treasuries<WH1595> for the destruction<WH6> of the Jews.<WH3064>

He also gave<WH5414> him the copy<WH6572> of the writing<WH3791> of the decree<WH1881> that was given<WH5414> out in Shushan<WH7800> to destroy<WH8045> them,<WH7200> to show it to Esther,<WH635> and to declare<WH5046> it to her,<WH6680> and to urge her to go in<WH935> to the king,<WH4428> to make supplication<WH2603> to him,<WH1245> and to make request before<WH6440> him,<WH5971> for her people.
Hathach<WH2047> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Esther<WH635> the words<WH1697> of Mordecai.<WH4782>
Then Esther<WH635> spoke<WH559> to Hathach,<WH2047> and gave him a message<WH6680> to Mordecai:<WH4782>

"All the king<WH4428>'s servants,<WH5650> and the people<WH5971> of the king<WH4428>'s provinces,<WH4082> know,<WH3045> that whoever,<WH376> whether man or woman,<WH802> comes<WH935> to the king<WH4428> into the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> without being called,<WH7121> there is one<WH259> law<WH1881> for him,<WH4191> that he be put to death, except<WH905> those to whom the king<WH4428> might hold out<WH3447> the golden<WH2091> scepter,<WH8275> that he may live.<WH2421> I have not been called<WH7121> to come in<WH935> to the king<WH4428> these thirty<WH7970> days.<WH3117>"
They told<WH5046> to Mordecai<WH4782> Esther<WH635>'s words.<WH1697>

Then Mordecai<WH4782> asked<WH559> them return answer<WH7725> to Esther,<WH635> "Don't<WH1819> think to yourself<WH5315> that you will escape<WH4422> in the king<WH4428>'s house<WH1004> any more than all the Jews.<WH3064>

For if you remain<WH2790> silent<WH2790> now,<WH6256> then relief<WH7305> and deliverance<WH2020> will come<WH5975> to the Jews<WH3064> from another<WH312> place,<WH4725> but you and your father<WH1>'s house<WH1004> will perish.<WH6> Who knows<WH3045> if you haven't<WH5060> come to the kingdom<WH4438> for such a time as this?<WH6256>"
Then Esther<WH635> asked<WH559> them to answer<WH7725> Mordecai,<WH4782>

"Go,<WH3212> gather together<WH3664> all the Jews<WH3064> who are present<WH4672> in Shushan,<WH7800> and fast<WH6684> for me,<WH398> and neither eat nor drink<WH8354> three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> night<WH3915> or day.<WH3117> I and my maidens<WH5291> will also fast<WH6684> the same way.<WH3651> Then I will go<WH935> in to the king,<WH4428> which is against the law;<WH1881> and if I perish,<WH6> I perish.<WH6>"
So Mordecai<WH4782> went his way,<WH5674> and did<WH6213> according to all that Esther<WH635> had commanded him.<WH6680>
